Class CardIndividualReport

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.gui.CardIndividualReport
public class CardIndividualReport extends Object
Provides UI components related to displaying detailed individual student reports. Includes functionality to create overlays showing student details accessible to teachers.

  • Method Details

    • createStudentDetailOverlay

      public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane createStudentDetailOverlay(Student student)
      Creates an overlay panel displaying detailed information about a specific student. Ensures that a logged-in teacher is available before proceeding.
      Parameters:
      student - The student whose details will be shown.
      Returns:
      A Pane containing the student detail UI overlay, or an empty container if no teacher is logged in.

    • createAttendanceStatusPieChart

      private static javafx.scene.chart.PieChart createAttendanceStatusPieChart(ClassAttendanceSummary.MonthlyAttendanceSummary summary)
      Creates a PieChart representing the attendance status distribution for a given monthly attendance summary.
      Parameters:
      summary - The monthly attendance summary containing counts of different attendance statuses.
      Returns:
      A PieChart visualizing present, absent, excused, and late attendance counts.

    • styledLabel

      private static javafx.scene.control.Label styledLabel(String text)
      Creates a Label with standard font size and color styling.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to display in the label.
      Returns:
      A styled Label with font size 13px and dark gray text color.

    • styledLabelBold

      private static javafx.scene.control.Label styledLabelBold(String text)
      Creates a Label with bold font styling and slightly larger font size.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to display in the label.
      Returns:
      A styled Label with font size 15px, bold weight, and dark text color.

    • sectionTitle

      private static javafx.scene.control.Label sectionTitle(String text)
      Creates a section title Label with larger bold font and padding.
      Parameters:
      text - The section title text.
      Returns:
      A styled Label with font size 16px, bold weight, and top padding.
